backend/main.mo: Motoko canister storing cafes, allowing add, list, search with filters, and fetch-by-ID, with simple text-based comparisons and map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two map-related features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI components, map logic, styling, and data hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying background and border defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app into #root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for search and cafe details pages and renders the router provider.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeCard.t: Displays a cafe card with selection handling, navigation to details, and badges for city and area.
frontend/src/components/cafes/CafeTileMa: Canvas‑based OSM tile map with world‑wrap, lat/long clamping, zooming, panning, and interactive cafe markers.
frontend/src/components/cafes/EmptyState: Shows search guidance or a no‑results message depending on the query state.
frontend/src/components/cafes/LoadingSta: Renders skeleton placeholders for cards and headings while data is loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed main content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Simple footer with attribution, year, and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo and navigation button returning to the home page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeDetails.ts: Fetches detailed cafe data by ID using the authenticated actor, with caching and conditional execution.
frontend/src/hooks/useCafeSearch.ts: Searches cafes by keyword and optional city using the actor, returning results with caching and disabled empty searches.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, providing identity, login, logout, and status via context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/webMercator.ts: Provides Web Mercator projection utilities for converting between lat/lng, tiles, and pixel coordinates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CafeDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected cafe, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CafeSearchPage.tsx: Implements the cafe search UI with list and map views, handling searches and cafe selection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, layout, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing implemented features for a cafe finder app.
